B

base - Variable in class MPC.MPCScanner
The current number base (10 to 36)
base - Variable in class MPC.TypeRange
base Type (type of values) of the subrange
baseName - Variable in class MPC.MPCContext
Base name for forming filenames
BEGIN - Static variable in class MPC.sym
 
bind - Variable in class MPC.Decl
The Binding in the Pascal declaration, which gives access to the name (TokenId)
bind - Variable in class MPC.ExprBinding
the Binding of this expression
bind - Variable in class MPC.ExprCall
the Binding (name) of the function/procedure to call
bind - Variable in class MPC.TypeId
the Binding (name) of this Type
bind - Variable in class MPC.TypePointer
Binding (name) of the referent/element Type
Binding - Class in MPC
A Binding consists of an identifier (TokenId) from the Pascal source, plus the (initially null) reference to the Decl node for the declaration that pertains in the context in which the TokenId appears.
Binding(TokenId, int, int) - Constructor for class MPC.Binding
Creates a new Binding instance given the TokenId and its location (start and end) in the source.
Block - Class in MPC
The class Block represents the declaration part of a Pascal program/function/procedure, in which all objects local to the program/function/procedure are defined, and a statement part, which specifies the actions to be executed upon these objects.
Block(Decls, Stmts, int, int) - Constructor for class MPC.Block
Creates a new Block instance.
block - Variable in class MPC.DeclProcFunc
Block for the procedure/function body
block - Variable in class MPC.Program
Block containing the top-level statements of the Program
